name: memer
description: A meme generator to demonstrate alphagov/paas-s3-broker

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && cp -r views package-lock.json package.json build
scripts.push: npm run build && cf v3-create-app memer && cf v3-apply-manifest -f manifest.yml && cf v3-zdt-push memer -p build

author: Crown Copyright
